website_summaries.verdict: Not the absolute top of the line but strong performance and a decent price considering all it has to offer.
pros: Smart TV features are easy to use with popular apps
Includes UHD technology that will yield the best possible contrast in the screen image, which is especially noticeable when viewing movies on this screen
cons: Doesn't have all of the bells and whistles as other models but it has outstanding features and capabilities

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this curved screen TV if you want a generous size, modern features, a mid-range price, and don't mind the trade-off of a slightly older model.
pros: Provides gorgeous Ultra HD resolution in a practical 55-inch size
Curved screen is elegant and makes it easy to watch TV from almost any angle in the room
Has both 4K resolution and HDR technology
Price is decent for all it has to offer
cons: Refresh rate is slower than some newer options

website_summaries.verdict: Although it's not the newest curved TV on the market, it's still a beautiful TV that has earned praise from many satisfied owners.
pros: Offers notable sound and 4K picture quality
Viewing angles are what you'd expect from a curved TV, and they are enhanced by the 55-inch screen
Price is more reasonable than models with similar design and technology
cons: Newer options are available, as this is a 2017 model
The 120 motion rate isn't quite as fast as some pricier or newer TVs

customer_reviews.title: State of the ART
customer_reviews.text: Quick set up, Great sound and Picture., I notice no glare. its very User friendly., No Cons, all Positives. Close to a 3d picture on some movies
customer_reviews.author: akonapet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy out of the box set up, device paring and system settings are a breeeze. Stunning picture and excellent sound, good selection of apps and responsive web browser. I would recommend a Bluetooth keyboard as it does make web navigation way easier. No complaints as of yet, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: imsfan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ANY OTHER TELEVISION !!! - THIS IS BEST OF THE BEST !!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST TV OUT THERE. PAID $780+ AND WORTH EVERY PENNY !!! 1) THE SOUND IS INCREDIBLE !! FEELS LIKE BOSE SURROUND SYSTEM OR SAME AS SITTING IN THEATER !! TRY THE OPENING SCENE FROM NEW 2017 KING KING. YOU WILL FREAK OUT ABOUT THE SOUND QUALITY !!! 2) THE CURVE IS PERFECT !! 3) PICTURE QUALITY IS AMAZING !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung does not stand by their product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product in November and it has stopped working. Contacted Samsung and they sent a technical team to my house three different times to attempt to fix the television. The T.V.was not fixed so they said they would send me a new T.V. THIS PROCESS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR A MONTH AND STILL NO RESOLUTION. Every time I call Samsung they tell me someone will be in contact within the next 7-10 days to set up an exchange. I've been a life long Samsung buyer and have 4 Samsung tv's in my home. I will no longer buy and Samsung products because of their horrible customer service and inconvenience this has caused.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 7 months... don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I had this tv only 7 months. One night I turned it off and the next morning it would not turn on... no standby light and no power at all... I tried everything and zero results. I am meticulous about the care of my things and I am the only person to use it. I spent over a year researching TVs and decided on this one... Loved it until this point. I have purchased Samsung products before and they were all fantastic without the first problem. This is great TV made with cheap parts. I paid way too much for a ‘disposable’ tv. This is very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: leigh ann

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I would never recommend this tv! My one star rating is generous! Set up and adjustments were difficult to get right. Finally, after we had the color etc. adjusted it still had a white haze on its picture reception ( the lighting in your room from windows/lamps etc. has to be JUST RIGHT 24/7 to get a clear picture). Because of this poor reception we removed it from our living room to our bedroom. Now it keeps telling us to shut it off because it’s over heating. The tv has plenty of ventilation around it! This tv is not worth the money or aggravation!! We are getting rid of it. We regret this purchase. Costly mistake for us! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous TV with great viewing angle. I'm very happy we didn't spend more on a super HD (higher res model) etc... I doubt anyone can tell the difference in resolution beyond 4K UHD. Good packaging, great delivery and was easy to wall mount. It's paired with our Bose solo and Tivo. We use the smart features from our Tivo and the Tivo remote to control the whole thing. I cut the cord this year using my Tivo for over the air reception coupled with streaming... finally free of the Cable TV monopoly.
customer_reviews.author: SL1986

customer_reviews.title: Equal to my $3000 55" one!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a good picture but I got a GREAT one! I did a lot of research both online and in stores. I have a $3000 curved screen 55" that I bought 2 years ago and wasn't looking to spend that much again, but still wanted a great picture. THIS is equal to my $$$$ one! Easiest remote in the world, fast set up. Totally pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Unkamengifts

customer_reviews.title: Tv is great! Nice color and features
customer_reviews.text: Tv is great! Nice color and features...my husband got the earphones and they work great. We found the connection through the source button and it hooked up right away. When the Bluetooth feature is geared to the headphones it is completely mute to the rest of the house.we learned that the mute button works when you press down on the volume button. There is definitely a glare on the tv because of the curves. We have lots of windows in the room. We closed the shades when it's bright. We will be keeping the tv even with the glare potential. Love just one simple remote!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Freiberg

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV, the software is only average
customer_reviews.text: It's a good TV and for the price it's a good deal. Of course the forced "smart" features are a shame but easy to remedy by having a Chromecast ultra and not connecting the TV to wifi ever. The remote is slick, though not universal, at least not really. It's supposed to control many devices but honestly, today the most important ones are the TV itself and a soundbar and for the most part the remote can't connect to soundbars.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: the difference is amazing! The graphics are insane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv to use for my computer, I was replacing a 50 inch Sony hd tv, the difference is amazing! The graphics are insane! The amount of detail you can see with this tv is amazing. Idk why it get bad reviews this tv was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tjay

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Samsung Curved 55-inch TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samsung Curved 55-inch TV!!! I was blown away with the dynamic picture and sound quality! You really do not need a sound bar for this TV! I would buy it again if I had the room :) You will be very satisfied with you purchase! I also purchased Bason USB LED Bias Lighting (LED Strip) for the back of the TV, what a beautiful sight to see with the ambient lighting behind the TV!!!! I just love the compliments from all my friends, and you will too when you receive your Samsung Curved 55-inch TV! (Bason USB LED lighting optional-the TV is gorgeous with them, but I love to accessorize).
customer_reviews.author: Joy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 55" perfect size. The curved screen is actually really subtle
customer_reviews.text: Loving this t.v. so far! 55" perfect size. The curved screen is actually really subtle. Great for gaming. The dynamic setting is actually a little too clear and crazy so we've been using the movie setting. Actually didn't need to do any manual adjustments to the picture quality. Good speakers, but we only tested them. We use a receiver. Also use the ps4 for streaming services. The t.v. has them in the smart feature and it does pop a couple of ads, but they're not too intrusive. Usually just asking you to sign up for Hulu or recommending a tv show to watch. I'll update soon. Prime free delivery. Got it at $509 right from Amazon. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Purchased while on sale
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. Purchased while on sale, new (went up $350 since then). The new simple remote is the best. All I had to do was log into my tv provider and the tv pulled every box we have on account, found the right one and after a quick download, the remote was fully programmed. All I can say is that this is actually the first “smart TV” I’ve owned and at the time it was quite a bargain. The picture is as good as you would expect, is bright, doesn’t blur from side viewing, etc... Very happy with this TV
customer_reviews.author: mtownshend

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years and a half I can say I like this tv a lot. Great quality, great size for my bedroom, and the features work fine for a guy just trying to Netflix and Chill...literally. The only issue that arose recently was on the YouTube app, I’d click a video, and the video next to it would play. Not sure why, but this is really recent (within the last month). Prior to that, all was great. And really, with a little press of a button to return to the previous screen, all is great.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the price, one exception
customer_reviews.text: This display rivals any in terms of resolution, brightness, and wizbang features. It's OS is exceptional. It's biggest fault is backlight quality. The backlight is annoyingly inconsistent. Given the premium price of QLED displays over this, it's almost understandable. I'm just disappointed that the quality of this display's backlight is so divergent from what I expected from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I got this at the end of October last year ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this at the end of October last year. Today the screen has gone out. The left side is messed up and part of this settings do not work anymore. Notice the left side of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Bigger Must Always Be Better
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new TV as the old one was dying. Of course, with only boys in the house (husband and sons), we had to have the biggest one we could find that would fit in our room that we could afford. Not sure about ordering TVs online due to size and installation, but Amazon was great. Installers came in and installed it and it has worked great. Actually like the curved screen as it makes easier to see the tv from various parts of the room. Highly recommend the tv and the installation service from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Good smart features
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to review for a while now just to ensure picture quality maintained. The only problem is an almost unnoticeable dark corner in the top right of the screen only about a square inch or so, but it just randomly started doing it. The smart features are great and the remote was great until my Irish Wolfhound ate it (literally). The replacement I bought was very easy to connect and works just like original.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good quality TV that would fit between two of my windows (as you can see by the photo) and the curve on this one made it fit perfectly! It was easy to get up and running with all of its features and apps and the only thing I’m still adjusting to is the remote but the voice control makes it a bit easier. I’ve had it up for about a week and the picture is crisp whether at night or during the day even with lots of natural light coming in the room it’s in. I’m very pleased with this purchase and hope to enjoy it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: LITTLEONEINCT

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this TV
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this TV! Zero problems so far and the "SMART" features, as well as the curved screen were well worth the extra couple of hundred bucks to me. I haven't hung it on the wall yet, but that's just me procrastinating (the story of my life).
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great tv quality
customer_reviews.text: The same TV with cheaper price at Sam's club for $799. I love the tv quality. The one star rating bec I bought tv for $924 and won't give me the difference. My option is to return and buy with cheaper price. added notes ,as of July 29, i started getting a horizontal line 1/3 from bottom of screen and it does not go away. I like the TV but i am concerned now about the this white line.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad F.

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is so good, you have a feeling you could actually touch ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my neighbor, who absolutely loves it. The picture quality is so good, you have a feeling you could actually touch the images. It is almost scary. The delivery guys came when they said they would, they were polite and helpful. They brought the HUUUUUGE box inside the house and they unpacked it (as advertised). Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Had it for a couple of months now. The curve adds a bit of depth perception which is good compared to the flat version. I mostly use it to see the locally televised football games and I got the Sunday NFL ticket together with a Fire TV to stream games that I can't catch. All in all a good investment I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Ionut Trestian

customer_reviews.title: beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this television. seriously. the picture is beautiful. the curve gives it that super expensive look and does not distort the image whatsoever. I love the remote, however, the voice control hardly ever works. it keeps saying " i'm working on that, try back later"... which kind of sucks. I still love this tv though!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant t.v.!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant t.v.! Very easy set up that connected to my wifi, cable, and Apple t.v.. The Samsung remote operates as the proxy remote for my cable and Apple t.v.. We have no problem with glare.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and size. Amazon's white glove delivery with product check was outstanding. I like the curved picture, it's almost like it adds a 3rd dimension to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: TV has issues.
customer_reviews.text: Major problems with the internet. I actually put this on its own wireless network to work best. It kept dropping internet access on a daily basis. Also. there is some issues with the HDMI which appears to be firmware related; it doesn't read the Firestick of FIOS all the time and just reads HDMI instead of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV with a great picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV with a great picture. I'm not sure the curved effect really does much. One item noted in other reviews, that I too have noticed, is that this TV picks up a lot of reflection from in the room so if you have lights on, or windows at the right angle, you will get significant glare.
customer_reviews.author: M Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to put together, the sound and picture are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A OLeary

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe any negative hype!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv unit in everyway...picture is stunning...will probably pay more for another inferior tv manufacturer with similar features...Samsung is brand to go with...easy ordering process with flawless delivery by UPS...totally satisfied...you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Picinich

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my son. It is the best TV I have ever owned. He says the same thing. He actually has told me that several times. Once you go to 4K UHD you will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Ike H. Slack

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I watch TV for an hour or two here and there so I was looking for something which looks nice turned on or off. This exactly fits the bill. Construction quality is good. Picture is sweet. Remote is elegant. Packaging was professional and the product seems to be new, straight from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, just be sure you completely read the setup because it will advertise to you. I had to reset it to clear that off. It does have a glare and the sound is coming from the bottom. So depending on what you are watching you may end up getting loud and low sound. Maybe a sound bar can fix this problem. Overall a good tv.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tovar

customer_reviews.title: This is my second 55" Curve. The other one is in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Love it , great, great price, picture is sharp. However, the delivery from the fed x guy was awful!!!!! He just left it on my pathway and not the front door . bad delivery! He just walked into the back of his truck, not even listening to me, slammed the door and drove off!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Resolution of 2160 and 4K Smart. The price is rediculous should buy 3 but ...
customer_reviews.text: This one spectacular LED TV. Resolution of 2160 and 4K Smart. The price is rediculous should buy 3 but no room. Picture and sound mode tweaked now perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Very clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tv. I love the curve! Makes the picture more realistic. And i love being able to go online and watch you tube. The only issue I have is the power receptacle plug is loose and some times would loose power. I had to squeeze the receptacles with a plier so it fit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Fitch

customer_reviews.title: great TV just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: great TV just what I wanted, the sound is ok will improve with a separate surround speakers. great features a lot of apps 3 hdmi connectors wireless connection great TV. Every great TV has one thing that may not be great for some. For me this TV power Code wow talking about short...? Wow! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Simply'Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and clear video
customer_reviews.text: Smart TV;S are great and state of the art and Samsung builds a really great smart curved TV I just love mine its so simple to use and everything is right at your finger tips and curved TV" have an amazing picture
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like spending money on electronics and usually end up with buyers remorse. Not this time. This TV is everything I was looking for at a price I could afford. I use this TV primarily for gaming (PS4) and it works great for that, but where it really shines is watching movies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No head phone port....grrrr
customer_reviews.text: Was going to send back, because it didn't have a port for earphones , decided to keep it because the picture is awesome! But I hate that it doesn't have sound on my Amazon movies, ...or.......earphones, .going to bring my old Samsung back...and put this one in the basemee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha A. Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, Perfect Picture.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good deal, very fast delivery, great picture, excellent colors, all I can tell You about this tv without writing for ten minutes is only good things...Samsung Electronics UN49MU6500 Curved 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)]]
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been great right out of the box, within the return window, Amazon dropped the price $130 asking refund but wont get
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great right out of the box. The setup techs were polite and set up tv quickly and carefully. Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: tsr

customer_reviews.title: Screen picture gone less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tv but.... Got the tv in January and now theres a big black bar down center of tv and random colored lines as well. Black bar is about 5 inches wide. Had it less than a year... Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Cook

customer_reviews.title: The picture is fantastic. My only issue was trying to get sound ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is fantastic. My only issue was trying to get sound thru my receiver and stereo speakers for Netflix. With a little bit of research, (Samsung's website is not very helpful) I was able to determine I needed an optical audio cable. Now I have stereo sound for all my components.
customer_reviews.author: Spenser

customer_reviews.title: No way to control without remote
customer_reviews.text: This is the most idiotic TV design I have ever seen. There is no way to control the tv unless u use the remote. So if u lose the remote you might as well throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Blin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic software, great picture!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that I would have to compromise the software on this tv for the picture quality and size, but I've completed switched away from my Roku thanks to this tv's ease of use and intuitive controls. The picture is great, the curve can be a little odd for guests or when first viewing, but you get used to it very quickly, and is a pretty neutral feature to me. Highly recommended, even when it's off it's my favorite piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Simon

customer_reviews.title: This TV is BEAUTIFUL! Everybody that comes over thought I paid thousands ...
customer_reviews.text: This TV is BEAUTIFUL! Everybody that comes over thought I paid thousands for it. The picture is great! I shopped around for a long time and Amazon had the best price on this tv and it wasn't even close.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good TV. I like the remote. I had a problem getting the TV remote to sync up correctly with my surround sound. I still have to use my surround sound remote to turn the volumn up and down. Other than that all else synced up good. It was worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Craigg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great quality but the service transportation no good. They delivered my tv with my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Farias

customer_reviews.title: Good tv. Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a damaged screen and am waiting for a refund. I plan to purchase again, though. We have this s same tv in 55” and really enjoy it. Once the return process is complete and we get a new one I will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Tadellemarie

customer_reviews.title: They change too much model to model, but still the best in my mind.
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Samsung, but I don't get why they can't get the same picture as I have them all side by side as PC monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound and picture. The curve is great, adds heaps of dimension.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Internet connection terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to keep an Internet connection very displeased
customer_reviews.author: LISA MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy this TV, but now I’ve been watching movies, and everything else for a couple of months.I believe that I made the right choice. I am in love with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Issues with original tv. But issue resolved
customer_reviews.text: Over all is a good tv, But I had issues with the TV screen . After 4 months it started having pixelated lines across the screen. Luckily there was a one year manufacturer warranty and they completely replace the screen .They don’t know why this occurred but they took care of the issue
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of HD TVs, usually vizio, in this same price point and each had its downside. I can't list a single con of this television. Picture is perfect, sound is amazing, and no glare. In fact, it has less glare than the flat screen it replaced. Remote is ergonomic and a breeze to use. The smart apps work very well and the UHD streams flawlessly over WIFI. Even diaglogue mixed with music, a common problem with thin TVs, is easily discernible. Bottom line, if you're considering buying this TV or one in this price point, buy this one, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV and great price! Less expensive than Black Friday deals at big box store. Delivery folks were punctual and knowledgeable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Best smart TV on the market
customer_reviews.text: The most intuitive smart TV software. It's great for little kids, techno-phobes, or just people who want their stuff to work and work well. I thought the curve would be dumb, but now I can't live without it
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hodder

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is me but I'm not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is me but I'm not sure that this is true 4K. I've seen a lot of 4K televisions and this one slacks just a little bit. A noticeable difference that is. But for the price for a curved "4K" I guess it'll have to do.
customer_reviews.author: AnonxEst

customer_reviews.title: Superior picture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and excellent picture quality. Curved works great in my gym.
customer_reviews.author: kalman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value with 3D effect.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture. Many shows appear to be in 3D. Not sure if curved screen causes this. Takes up much less space than previous DLP T.V. T.V. keeps cool. Easy to operate with intuitive instructions. Great value for less than $1k.
customer_reviews.author: BabaDan

customer_reviews.title: This tv is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing!!!!!! I love it! Beautiful pic. Very high quality pic! Its not to curved. Perfect. Best tv I have ever owned. Very vibrant colors. Heavy though...2 man job to hang
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Taber

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and PC monitor !!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a computer monitor in my business. Compared to my SONY 4K, there is still some sharpness and quality lacking if you are using high resolution graphics, however, I bought another one of these given the fact that the difference is only visible in close viewing and very detailed graphics programs. Be careful, I bought this over $700, and the second monitor was $450 range. Do a detailed search before ypou press the order button.
customer_reviews.author: RenkoTrading

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love about it
customer_reviews.text: it's a curved screen! its 4k UHD! ...what's not to love about it? Even the remote is awesome. For someone who does not have to dial in each channel to watch on tv, just speak into the remote and it will do the rest. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: weizen

customer_reviews.title: this was was just as clear and concise as the more expensive television -- like under $1
customer_reviews.text: now this is a television worth the weight - I just got home from a place where someone had paid $8K for a television; this was was just as clear and concise as the more expensive television -- like under $1,000
customer_reviews.author: vikki buss

customer_reviews.title: I tell everybody this is my baby I love this thing I have it in my Apartment and ...
customer_reviews.text: I tell everybody this is my baby I love this thing I have it in my Apartment and I love it it is a great item the best item I have ever bought in 2017 thank you thank you thank you thank you
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. What a great value too. I could not be more pleased. The picture in 4k is so clear. The curved screen really cuts down on the glare from the sun or light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly Harvest Homestead

customer_reviews.title: No wifi connection
customer_reviews.text: The "smart" feature doesn't work since it stopped connecting to wifi. Did everything to fix it. Don't rely on it for that. Had to buy a firestick
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Torjman

customer_reviews.title: Great UHD TV.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful picture. Smart TV features are very easy to use. Have had the TV now for 10 months and not a single complaint do I have. Previously owned a Vizio 50 inch set. It was alright but it cannot compare to Samsung. After about a year it started having issues with dead pixels. So far like I said the Samsung has performed flawlessly. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family !! Great picture !! Sound could be better !
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, sounds better with a surround sound system !! Speakers not so good !!
customer_reviews.author: L.J

customer_reviews.title: The TV died 8 months after i bought it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV and the Picture and sound quality is amazing. One thing though one morning i turned it on and it had dead pixels and after 3 days the screen was not showing anything, It literally died and now i turn it on and the screen its just black. 800 dlls to the trash in 8 months, samsung is also not really helpful with this problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice definition, it looks like the characters on the TV could walk right out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Needham

customer_reviews.title: WOW Awesome picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: WOW Awesome picture and sound,arrived perfect condition,delivery persons unpacked TV,assembled base on TV and placed TV on my stand. Then checked out picture and was sure everything was working. Great price and customer service from Amazon,you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Will stop working just outside of warranty
customer_reviews.text: Died after 1 year 4 months. Out of warranty and going to cost me to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Love

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Present for my daughter and son-in-law came in perfect condition. Beautiful picture good sound and pretty easy hook up just what we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Pammylebo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is reputable brand
customer_reviews.text: Super clear picture, remote broke called Samsung they sent me new one for free under warranty! Would buy Samsung again
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Love the instant access to movies
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use the magic wand! Can't find some features but I am still learning. Love the instant access to movies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Boysen

customer_reviews.title: I love my 65" TV!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great tv. Work great, picture is unbelievable. Delivery was fast. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Walter W. Paholak

customer_reviews.title: this item has a great picture, and it's super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, this item has a great picture, and it's super easy to use. The controls took a little to get used to, but moving from app to app is super easy now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Ryther

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am on the phone with Samsung as I type. After having the TV a little over a year it has crapped out and won't turn on. Trying to see if is still under warranty. No coverage. I will stick with phillips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Patience Nolan

customer_reviews.title: We love this TV
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV. We do not have one negative thing to say about it!!! Color, sound, set up was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: DAWN HEGLEY

customer_reviews.title: What a great product...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV! I'm a TCM watcher, and old black and whites look like they were made last week...love this television...very easy to get up and running...
customer_reviews.author: kennychev

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. So easy to use right out of the box. The picture is simply amazing. The detail and color is impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it, even though they bearly use the smart ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents. They love it, even though they bearly use the smart TV functions. The remote search mic function is really great.
customer_reviews.author: lamboiah

customer_reviews.title: A Real Winner
customer_reviews.text: The color is awesome and where it is can be seen clearly by all. It took all of 10 min. to set up and the instructions are easy. You will be extemely pleased with this truly smart set.
customer_reviews.author: jeff stark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. Ideal with the new Microsoft XBox-1X (4K). My son loves the combination!
customer_reviews.author: jtm

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: NICE! NICE! NICE! I REALLY ENJOY THIS TV. EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED, VERY WELL WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: pair this with a home theater system as the tv sound is only fair
customer_reviews.text: these guys that deliverd where on time polite and knowlegable The picture quality is awesome and the setup instructions where easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: TV died
customer_reviews.text: TV died after 11 months. Won't turn back on... this was my first Samsung TV, will be the last time I buy anything Samsung...
customer_reviews.author: rdsteve23

customer_reviews.title: Nice curved hd but. .
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice tv but the price did drop less than a week after I purchased it. I was able to get credit for the difference. You might be able to get a price adjustment from your credit card company if you paid over the current price. This tv claims hdr capabilities but I was told by somebody that it's not full hdr. Anyway still shows good picture. I like the voice remote. Be sure to check your tv screen with a flash light before the delivery guy leaves. I noticed a small chip on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: lovegreatdeals

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. The picture is very clear and colors are beautiful. A nice addition is that you can speak into the controller and request and channel and the TV changes to that channel.
customer_reviews.author: Merrie Mary

customer_reviews.title: I could have saved 15 bucks if I had bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I could have saved 15 bucks if I had bought this TV from Costco but the 2 day delivery which included set up was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aerin Alese Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a 4k sammy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 630ish, feel like I stole it. Far from the best, but good for the price; I'm happy with it. Consider soundbar or some type of audio solution. If you're coming from 720 or 1080 anything, you're going to be blown away- if you already have a 4k set, particularly one that's pricier than this one- you may be surprised with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: ... luck on things from Amazon but it arrived in perfect condition and is the best t
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting to arrive shattered with my luck on things from Amazon but it arrived in perfect condition and is the best t.v. I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: India Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I waited and got this TV. I love it. Love the curve. And so easy to set up and hook up with AMAZON Fire TV. Couch Potato.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: A great looking TV for a good price, the picture is phenominal and the color scale is fantastic too
customer_reviews.author: Damp

customer_reviews.title: Perfer the regular screen 100% more
customer_reviews.text: Just too glaring. No matter where you stand it glares, and it does so even when it's turned off
customer_reviews.author: Joel Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s great t.v for the price. The picture quality is totally fine for my taste and it looks great mounted on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Alanzo

customer_reviews.title: CAME IN DAMAGED I SENT PIC,
customer_reviews.text: CAME IN DAMAGED I SENT PIC,SENDING BACK AND I WANT THE SAME TV WHEN YOU GET THE DAMAGED ONE BACK TY

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics UN55MU6500 Curved 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)
product_meta.description: Size:55-InchThe Samsung MU6500 Curved Ultra HDTV redefines the viewing experience by producing a colorful High Dynamic Range (HDR) picture. Our new Smart TV user-interface (UI), the new Smart Remote Controller with voice navigation capability provides faster access to your favorite streaming content choices and more.
feature_bullets: 4X more pixels than Full HD means you’re getting 4X the resolution, so you’ll clearly see the difference.
See vibrant and pure color for a realistic experience.
OneRemote automatically detects and controls all your connected devices and content with no manual programming required*.
Smooth action on fast-moving content with Motion Rate 120. Multiroom Link present
